com.yahoo.labs.samoa.learners.classifiers.rules

Class HorizontalAMRulesRegressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.labs.samoa.learners.classifiers.rules.HorizontalAMRulesRegressor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.github.javacliparser.Configurable, Learner, RegressionLearner, Serializable

    public class HorizontalAMRulesRegressor
extends Object
implements RegressionLearner, com.github.javacliparser.Configurable
    Horizontal AMRules Regressor is a distributed learner for regression rules learner. It applies both horizontal parallelism (dividing incoming streams) and vertical parallelism on AMRules algorithm.
    Author:
    Anh Thu Vu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
